name: Astro-Quotes
overview: The player attempts to solve a famous quote by solving synonyms. The player has 4 words on the top of the screen with a number of blank spaces. The player must guess the synonyms for the 4 words. For every synonym correctly guessed, all letters of that word as displayed throughout the puzzle. As the player solves synonyms, letters of the famous quote are displayed. A player completes a puzzle by solving the quote.
